Data transfer interfaces

These base classes define interfaces through which SAMRAI works with arbitrary refinement, coarsening and time interpolation of data. SAMRAI implementations of these interfaces are in the SAMRAI::xfer package.

  • SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator
  • SAMRAI::hier::RefineOperator
  • SAMRAI::hier::TimeInterpolateOperator
